work.description: Gemtek is the world-leading provider of Wireless Broadband solutions, offering a wide range of solutions from residential to business.
highlights: Lead two engineers to migrate the company's IoT cloud services from AWS to IBM Softlayer
Develope various Alexa skills for company products. One smart home skill was submitted and passed the certification process
Implement an OAuth2 authorization server and a website for login and authorization. Integrate it with existing account services

Design and implement a backup system for the company's core databases. The system supports both on-demand and scheduled backup and restore, managed with APIs or a web interface. Additional features include notification, verification and backup history
Implement a dashboard that visualize various business metrics with maps and charts
Maintain a legacy notification system and extend its functionality to support firebase cloud messaging (FCM) and scheduled notifications
